"They answered all my calls and questions quickly." "I called on Friday for help with a vent on our roof just above our child’s room." "We live in the same neighborhood and trust me he is our neighborhood roofer."

As a realtor myself who is selling my own home - I needed some shingles replaced that blew off. This company came out the same day and fixed them same day too. Very knowledgeable and nice and charged a very reasonable price. 10/10 would recommend. More
Honesty and Integrity is hard to come by these days. We received large hail in Anna and we had MD Roofing inspect our roof. No work was needed and said roof looked good. Thank you Michael !! More

If I could give 10 stars I would. From the initial roof inspection and patiently working with our insurance company to the beautiful new roof, rebuilt chimney and new skylights, this process has been seamless. Michael and all of his team … More
